title: Nvidia $100 Billion OpenAI Investment Plan Reportedly Hits Snag Amid Internal Concerns - Amazon . com ( NASDAQ : AMZN ), Alphabet ( NASDAQ : GOOG )
description: Nvidia's proposed $100 billion investment in OpenAI has reportedly stalled as CEO Jensen Huang raises concerns over the AI startup's spending discipline and intensifying competition, prompting both companies to reconsider a smaller, nonbinding equity deal even as OpenAI attracts heavy Big Tech interest and posts surging revenue., Web site created using create-react-app
